ref: 2950 kalya4 n., ˚yā -- f. ʻ spirituous liquor ʼ lex. [Cf. kaḍaṅga- m. ʻ id. ʼ, kalukkā -- f. ʻ tavern ʼ: ← Drav. see kaṇḍati2]

bhal. kal m. ʻ beestings ʼ (semant. cf. pīyūṣa -- ʻ beestings ʼ > ʻ nectar produced at the churning of the ocean ʼ?).
